com.identityx.clientSDK.base

Class KeyHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.identityx.clientSDK.base.KeyHelper

  • public class KeyHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for managing decryption of the shared secret passed back in a Token object. When a request for a new token is made, RSA 2048 key pair is generated. The public key wrapped in a X509 certificate is sent over to the server in order to be used for encrypting the shared secret to be returned. The private key is then used to decrypt the shared secret so it can be used in subsequent calls to the Rest servcies.
